Hero.long-text: Do you want a peaceful and relaxing vacation away from the crowds, yet close to events, entertainment, delicious food, and fine wines that Istria offers? Here you can find the perfect blend of relaxation and enjoyment in everything Istria provides!

Second.opis-1: Charming towns, wine routes, cycling trails, and beautiful beaches – everything is at your fingertips.
Second.opis-2: Enjoy the tranquility of nature and a relaxing environment. Istria is the perfect place to escape everyday stress.
Second.opis-3: Enjoy comfort and relaxation, with top features that meet all your needs.

Third.opis-1: Please familiarize yourself with the rules to ensure a pleasant stay for all guests. Thank you for your understanding!
Third.opis-2: Explore photos showcasing the beauty of our space and the wonderful moments you can experience during your stay.
Third.error-datum-nije-dostupan: Selected date is not available, please try another.
Third.error-dogodila-se-greska: An error occurred, please check all details or contact us.
Third.error-previse-ljudi: The house can accommodate a maximum of 4 people.
Third.error-premalo-ljudi: Please select the number of people.
Third.error-premalo-odabranih-dana: It is not possible to book less than 7 days.
Third.error-samo-od-subote: You can book only from Saturday to Saturday
Third.rezervirano: You have successfully booked Casa Fragola.

FeaturesModal.parking-1: Free private parking is available on-site without reservation.
FeaturesModal.internet-1: WiFi is available throughout the property and is free of charge.

RulesModal.prijava-2: Please inform the property in advance of your arrival time.
RulesModal.otkazivanje-1: Cancellation and prepayment policies vary depending on the accommodation type.
RulesModal.otkazivanje-2: Enter your stay dates and check the conditions for the selected option.
RulesModal.polog-1: A damage deposit of €200 is required upon arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash after inspection of the accommodation.
RulesModal.djeca-2: Children of all ages are welcome.
RulesModal.djeca-3: To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number of children and their ages in your search.
RulesModal.djeca-4: Children's cots and extra beds policy
RulesModal.djeca-5: The number of cots allowed depends on the option you choose. Check your selected option for more info.
RulesModal.djeca-6: No extra beds are available at this property.
RulesModal.djeca-7: All cots are subject to availability.
RulesModal.granica-1: There's no age requirement for check-in
RulesModal.kartice-1: This property does not accept cash
RulesModal.red-1: Guests must be quiet between 22:00 and 08:00
